contents.title: Welcome to d0xigen!
contents.description: Hello ðŸ‘‹, you are currently viewing the documentation for d0xigen - UI layer for documentation to my projects. And yeah, this is me: d0rich.

children.value: Hello ðŸ‘‹, you are currently viewing the documentation for
- UI layer for documentation to my projects. And yeah, this is me:
I have created this theme to make my documentation sites look the same. Also, d0xigen makes it easier for me to create documentation sites for my projects. All for me, but you can use it too.
Like all front-end projects, this one is created within Node.js ecosystem. Layer itself is available as a package on npm.
. So, you need to install Nuxt 3 first. I believe you can do it yourself.
All is required is to extend your Nuxt app with
And technically it will work. But I believe you want to customize at least general information.
'ðŸŒ¬ðŸ•® Docs to breath life into your project'
That's it! You can start creating content. Create
folder for that and enjoy features of

contents.title: Unique style
contents.description: I was inspired by Persona 5 videogame style. I wanted to create something similar for all my projects. I think it looks pretty cool.

children.value: I was inspired by Persona 5 videogame style. I wanted to create something similar for all my projects. I think it looks pretty cool.
I even created a design system for it. You can find it

. It's only for me, but you can try use it too. Pay attention that it has terrible Developer Experience. Shapes from Persona 5 style are not something browser is optimized to render. So, these components have quite a lot of low level CSS configuration.
I found some articles with references to Persona 5 style during work on these components:
The UI and UX of Persona 5

contents.title: Color theme
contents.description: d0xigen supports dark and light color themes. You can switch between them by clicking on the special icon in the top right corner.

children.value: supports dark and light color themes. You can switch between them by clicking on the special icon in the top right corner.
That's one small step for a man, a giant leap for mankind.
Node.js is a popular open-source, cross-platform JavaScript runtime environment that is used for building scalable, high-performance network applications.

Node.js is a popular technology, which means that it can be a target for cybercriminals looking to exploit vulnerabilities in the platform or its dependencies. Regularly updating dependencies and monitoring for security vulnerabilities is crucial.

In rare cases, Node.js applications may experience memory leaks or other issues that can cause the application to crash or become unresponsive. It is important to monitor memory usage and investigate any issues that may be causing the problem.

will generate them for you (if you want to use my style in images ðŸ˜„) automatically.

contents.title: Search Engine Optimization
contents.description: d0xigen also optimize your projects for search engines.

children.value: also optimize your projects for search engines.
generates meta tags for your documentation site based on your configuration.

props.code:
<meta name="keywords" content="documentation, docs, software development, d0xigen, d0rich">
<meta name="author" content="Nikolay Dorofeev">
<meta name="generator" content="Nuxt 3">
<meta property="og:site_name" content="d0xigen">
<meta property="og:image" content="https://d0xigen.d0rich.me/og/image.jpg">
<meta property="og:url" content="https://d0xigen.d0rich.me/features/seo">
<meta content="Search Engine Optimization" property="og:title">
<meta name="description" content="ðŸŒ¬ðŸ•® Docs to breath life into your project">
<meta content="ðŸŒ¬ðŸ•® Docs to breath life into your project" property="og:description">
